Class PerformanceMetrics

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.util.PerformanceMetrics
public class PerformanceMetrics extends Object
Tracks performance metrics for Neon protocol operations. Thread-safe counters for measuring throughput, latency, and resource usage.
